channel.title: [PI] 634 animations, animations are not animating
channel.description:
Hello,
After 2weeks or something i finnaly added animations but now (like the title says) animations are not animating.
What it gives in my console
RS2 user client - release #317 java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 1 at Class36.methodCustomAnimations(Class36.java:65) at Animation.unpackConfig(Animation.java:1710) at client.startUp(client.java:7565) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:4737) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:745) NPC.DAT : 1489108188 Called method225 NPC.IDX : 1489126980 Called method225
Thanks
